body:
Manually playing around with different environment variables and values, some combinations instead produce this failure:

    SIGILL: illegal instruction
    PC=0x1832fea5 m=0
    
    goroutine 1 [running]:
    
    eax    0x0
    ebx    0x1832fea4
    ecx    0x183000d0
    edx    0x1832fea4
    edi    0x1831009d
    esi    0x1832ffa5
    ebp    0x0
    esp    0x1832fe9c
    eip    0x1832fea5
    eflags 0x10246
    cs     0x2b
    fs     0x5b
    gs     0x63
